headline: Universal Health Services, Inc. (UHS): Among Small-Cap Healthcare Stocks Hedge Funds Are Buying
summary: We recently published a list of 15 Small-Cap Healthcare Stocks Hedge Funds Are Buying. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Universal Health Services, Inc. (NYSE:UHS) stands against other small-cap healthcare stocks hedge funds are buying. The U.S. healthcare sector has performed better in 2025 compared to the broader market. […]

headline: Winners And Losers Of Q1: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) Vs The Rest Of The Hospital Chains Stocks
summary: As the Q1 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the hospital chains industry, including HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) and its peers.
